metadata.name: Citizenship #0001
metadata.description: The Figment Citizenship NFT is your provably unique digital identity that unlocks real utility such as NFT-permissioned, transferable access to Virtual Country Clubs and Physical Embassy Houses. Join Figment in building a country in the cloud for global citizens to belong everywhere. If you have bought this Citizenship NFT on the secondary market you can register for Citizenship on Figment's Discord Server.
